column4: Hello , can anyone help me install support for mp3s, i cannot seem to play or burn them
dont know what xmms is
xmms is like the winamp for linux
you need the codecs to be able to play mp3s.
how do i install them?
!tell Pyru about restricted
go to that page that ubotu gave you.
read carefully, and you'll have no problems.
hmm well i installed it and using Juk it still wont play any of the mp3s
did you go to that page?
yes i installed the gstreamer and all still wont work.
try this > in a terminal, type sudo apt-get install xmms
I can play them via the internal player from frostwire.
then try to play with xmms.
well they now open with totem, how do i make xmms default music player?
right-click any mpp3 file, go to properties, then click the "open with" tab
if xmms is not already in the list, click add
then find xmms and click on it
cool works!
thanks VR_
np
you any good with web servers and ubuntu?

maybe i could help out.
